name: 7 day Forecast
des: A responsive app designed to display the current day and  7 day forecast of any city the user has searched for.I've utilized the framework react alongside using hooks such as useState and useEffect. Includes the framer-motion dependency for transistion effects

name: Ecommerce ShoppingCart
des: A responsive ecommerce app that displays a shopping site for cars. I've used the react framework alongside react-router, using hooks suchs as useEffect and useState.

name: Covid District Data
des: A responsive app that displays the current covid-19 data of a choosen neighbourhood in Toronto. I've used axios to fetch call the api and also have implemented chart.js to present the selected neighboour in a graph

name: Showname Finder
des: A responsive app made using the framework react that displays tv shows with what the user has searched for. I've used react components, and hooks such as useState and useEffect.
